justification: Shows awareness of B’s contrarian style and archetype preferences, but misreads B’s QB situation (Lucas Carter is out, so Derek White isn’t redundant) and overstates RB thinness. Separates motivations and outlines accept/reject reasons, yet relies on some inaccurate assumptions. The trade itself is plausible and fits B’s preferences (deep-threat WR, dual-threat QB) while giving A needed RB upside. Explanation is concise but contains factual slips that weaken ToM precision.
